casebody.data:
STATE
v.
Jaahkii Quran HARRIS. No. 166P16-1. Supreme Court of North Carolina. May 9, 2016. John L. Wait, High Point, for Harris, Jaahkii Quran. Rory Agan, Assistant Attorney General, for State of North Carolina. *93Joseph L. Hyde, Assistant Attorney General, for State of North Carolina. R. Andrew Murray, District Attorney, for State of North Carolina.

The following order has been entered on the motion filed on the 9th of May 2016 by State of NC for Temporary Stay:

"Motion Allowed by order of the Court in conference, this the 9th of May 2016."
